text: Which drainage pattern is best formed in the area of alternate hard and soft rocks
explanation: A trellised drainage pattern is characterized by a network of streams and rivers that form a rectangular or grid-like pattern is typically found in areas with alternating layers of hard and soft rocks

text: Rocks formed through cementation of accumulated materials under water is ?
explanation: sedimentary rock is a type of rock that forms from the accumulation and compression of sediment such as mineral particles ,organic matter and rock fragments examples are  shale, siltstone, sandstone, and breccia

text: An instruction of thick acid lava, which forces overlaying sedimentary rock layers to bulge into a dome, may cool and solidify to form a
explanation: A  laccolith is a type of igneous intrusion that forms when thick, acidic lava pushes up overlaying  sedimentary rock layers, causing them to bulge into a dome shape. As the lava cools and solidifies, it forms a distinctive body of rock

text: The Greek system of classifying climate is based on
explanation: The Greek system of weather classification is based on temperature and rainfall

text: What will be the time at Greenwich meridian when it is 12 noon at longitude 60\(^0\)E
explanation:
The difference in longitude between  the Greenwich meridian (long,0\(^0\) ) and longitude 60\(^0\)E =60\(^0\)
For a longitude difference of 15\(^0\) , there will be a time difference of 1 hr Thus, for  60\(^0\) , the time difference will be
\(\frac{1hr}{15º} \times 60º \) =4hrs
since we have traveled west of 60\(^0\)E to reach 0\(^0\) ( Greenwich meridians)
We subtract  time
Thus .if it is 12 noon at long 60\(^0\)E the time at Greenwich meridian =14noon -4hrs =8.00 am

text: The movement of Earth around the sun on its elliptical orbit is called
explanation: The movement of Earth around the sun on its elliptical orbit is known as revolution ( it takes approximately 36525 days to complete ). Rotation, on the other hand,  refers to the Earth's spin on its axis, which takes approximately 24 hours to complete

text: The Deccan Plateau in Indian is a good example of
explanation: The Deccan Plateau in Indian is a large volcanic plateau, formed as a result of extensive volcanic activity during a Cretaceous to Eocene period

text: Horst is a feature associated with?
explanation: A horst is a type of geological structure that forms when a block of rock is uplifted along fault, creating a raised area or ridge .it is a characteristic feature of a block mountain

text: Which of the following pairs of land forms are surface features of a karst region? i.Clint ii.Grikes iii.Stalagmite iv.Cavin
explanation: Clint and Grikes are surface features of a karst region, formed through the dissolution of soluble rock like limestone by groundwater

text: Which of the following conditions can produce a waterfall?

options.A: sharp break in the bed of a river
options.B: elbow of capture of young rivers

explanation: A waterfall typically forms when there is a sudden, sharp break in the bed of a river, causing the water to flow vertically or steeply down a slope

text: In which of the following regions will weathering by frost action occur throughout the years
explanation: Frost weathering occurs when water seeps into cracks and joints in rock, freezes, and expands, causing the rock to break apart. In cool, temperate regions, frost action can  occur throughout the year, especially at higher elevations or in areas with permafrost

text: The lapse rate refers to the average rate at which ?

options.A: radiant energy is converted to heat

explanation: the normal lapse rate refers to the average rate at which the temperature decreases with an increase in elevation/ altitude in the atmosphere.The normal lapse rate is about 6.5ºc per kilometer

text: Which of the following is proof of the Earth's spherical shape?

options.B: variation in the length of the day and night making of a year

explanation: circumnavigation is traveling around in a continuous path ,returning to the starting point.It is proof of the spherical shape of the Earth because if the Earth were flat, you would eventually reach an edge, but circumnavigation shows there is no edge

text: Which of the following types of rocks contain fossils?
explanation: Sedimentary rocks are formed from the accumulation and compression of  sediments, such as mineral particles, organic matter, and fossils

text: The natural exchange of water between land, oceans and the atmosphere is known as
explanation: the hydrological cycle (water cycle) is the continuous process which water is circulated between the earth and the atmosphere

text: Lines drawn on a map connecting places with equal duration of sunshine are called
explanation: isohel are line on a map that connects points with equal duration of sunshine  or solar radiationisotherms are line on a map that  connect points with equal temperatureisonephs are line on a ,map that connect point with the equal precipitation or rainfall

text: Which of the following examples of rock is mostly likely to be weathered by the process of solution ?
explanation: limestone is a sedimentary rock composed  primarily of calcium carbonate ,it is highly susceptible to weathering through the process of solution (chemical weathering) when rain water, which is  slightly acidic, come into contact with limestone,it can dissolve the calcium carbonate leading to dissolution of rock surfaces ,karst processes and formation of underground passage ways

text: Which of the following occurs when the sun is vertically overhead at the equator?

options.C: deflection of winds and ocean currents

explanation: when the sun is vertically overhead at the equator ,it marks the occurrence of an equinox . during an equinox ,day and night are approximately equal in length and this occurs twice a year , around March 21 and September 23.
